title: [Bug Report?] What does Riot have against hearts?
body:
Hearts apparently don't show up in posts. Like, they're completely deleted from the post, upon posting. They show up in the preview.

It's not like they're interpreted as invisible syntax marks, because \
---
edit: Found further symptoms upon trying to post this. Apparently, writing < 3 (without the space in between) ends the post. As in, anything after those two characters is deleted and not recorded (hence the cut-off above).

Don't believe me? Try replying to this post with a comment containing < 3 (without the space in between).
---
edit 2: the issue appears to be with the < character. If it is not immediately followed by a space, anything following it is deleted.
---
edit3 test:

>quote

Yeah, the deletion thing happens inside quotes, too.
